articles.title: Why some people are mosquito magnets - Science Daily

articles.content: It's impossible to hide from a female mosquito -- she will hunt down any member of the human species by tracking our CO2 exhalations, body heat, and body odor. But some of us are distinct "mosquito m… [+5939 chars]
